strings.CHEF_UTILITY_ALT_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKILL: Twirl upwards then slam down, exploding with <style=cIsUtility>activated oil</style> for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Launch again</style> by reactivating this ability before landing.
strings.HUNTRESS_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Teleport</style> into the sky. Target an area to rain arrows, <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> all enemies and dealing <style=cIsDamage>330% damage per second</style>.
strings.BANDIT2_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. Fire a revolver shot for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. Kills grant <style=cIsDamage>stacking tokens</style> for a flat <style=cIsDamage>60%</style> more damage on Desperado.
strings.ENGI_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION: Place a turret that <style=cIsUtility>inherits all your items.</style> Fires a cannon for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage per second</style>. Can place up to 2.
strings.TOOLBOT_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTION: Enter a heavy stance, equipping both your <style=cIsDamage>primary attacks</style> at once. Gain <style=cIsUtility>100 armor</style>, but lose <style=cIsHealth>-50% movement speed</style>.
strings.KEYWORD_WEAK: <style=cKeywordName>Weaken</style><style=cSub>Reduce movement speed and damage by <style=cIsDamage>40%</style>. Reduce armor by <style=cIsDamage>30</style>.</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARUTILITYREPLACEMENT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Replace your Utility Skill</style> with <style=cIsUtility>Shadowfade</style>. 

Fade away, becoming <style=cIsUtility>intangible</style> and gaining <style=cIsUtility>+30% movement speed</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> for <style=cIsHealing>18.2% <style=cStack>(+18.2% per stack)</style> of your maximum health</style>. Lasts 3 <style=cStack>(+3 per stack)</style> seconds.
strings.SKILL_LUNAR_UTILITY_REPLACEMENT_DESCRIPT: Fade away, becoming <style=cIsUtility>intangible</style> and <style=cIsUtility>gaining movement speed</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> for <style=cIsHealing>6.5% of maximum health</style> per second.
